title: April 11th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: April 11th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Kardashian Family update, Bennifer engagement, Oscar's drama update and Selling Sunset
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from an Oscar update regarding Will Smith to another comprehensive Kardashian family update. See below for the topics of the week:



Kardashian Family Update

  • Kravis (Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker) get "married" in Vegas
  • Hulu Premiere of the Kardashian's new show
  • Kris Jenner’s new haircut
  • Kayne West drops out of Coachella


Bennifer

  • Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez engaged for the second time


Oscars Drama Update

  • Will Smith Banned from Academy Events for 10 years


Selling Sunset

  • Chrishell Stause Bought her $3 million home with Justin Hartley ring





Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
